items.title: Leveraging tax credits and incentives for sustainability projects

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Randa Barsoum, Tax Partner at PwC US, highlights that tax credits for sustainability extend beyond obvious energy incentives to include state and local abatements, location-based incentives, and R&D tax credits tied to innovation. The core message is that viewing sustainability investments through a broader tax lens can unlock meaningful tax value for businesses.
bullets: Tax incentives for sustainability are broader than just energy credits.
State and local abatements and location-based incentives can support projects.
R&D tax credits may apply to innovation efforts like reimagining packaging or processes.
Viewing sustainability investments through a wider tax perspective can generate meaningful tax value.
takeaways: When evaluating sites, factor state and local abatements and location-based incentives into siting and cost models.
Include potential R&D tax credits in the business case for process or packaging innovations tied to sustainability.
Broaden project ROI analyses to capture tax value from non-energy incentives.
Work sustainability planning into tax strategy to maximize available incentives and reduce net project costs.

items.title: GeForce Garage - Summer of RTX Community Build

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this video announces the winner of the Summer of RTX r/buildapc Community Build contest, showcasing a small-form-factor GeForce RTX 5090 rig built by u/JeffersonPutnam. The description lists the full winning system specs and provides links to the PCPartPicker build, the GeForce host, and NVIDIA GeForce social channels.

Featured system: a small-form-factor GeForce RTX 5090 rig in a Fractal Design Era 2 chassis.

Links included: host (Dwight) Twitter and full parts list on PCPartPicker, plus GeForce social/community links.
takeaways: The build demonstrates community use of an RTX 5090 in enthusiast SFF systemsâ€”useful signal of high-end consumer GPU deployment scenarios.
Power and cooling choices (Corsair SF1000 SFX PSU and Nautilus 240 RS AIO) highlight the PSU and thermal considerations required to integrate a top-tier GPU into compact chassis.
Platform pairing (MSI B850I Edge + Ryzen 7 9800X3D) provides a concrete example of a modern CPU/motherboard combination used with the RTX 5090 for high-performance builds.
Public parts list (PCPartPicker) and social/community coverage offer accessible configuration data and adoption signals that can be monitored for market and compatibility insights.

items.title: TTEC accelerates AI deployment and revenue streams with Google Cloud Consulting

ai.summary: Based on the available description, TTEC partnered with Google Cloud Consulting to rapidly prototype and deploy GenAI solutions on Google Cloud, accelerating its digital transformation. The collaboration streamlined operations, boosted developer productivity, and unlocked entirely new revenue streams while compressing the companyâ€™s deployment timeline.
bullets: TTEC worked with Google Cloud Consulting to rapidly prototype and deploy AI solutions.
Leveraged GenAI and Google Cloudâ€™s infrastructure to streamline operations.
Efforts boosted developer productivity and shortened transformation timelines.
Partnership unlocked entirely new revenue streams for TTEC.
Google Cloud Consulting expanded what the company considered possible for the business.
takeaways: Plan for scalable cloud infrastructure to support emerging GenAI workloads and faster deployment cycles.
Consider engaging cloud consulting partners to compress transformation timelines and accelerate proof-of-concept to production.
Prioritize developer productivity tools and automation to speed AI solution delivery.
Factor potential new revenue streams from AI initiatives into capacity, pricing, and investment planning.
